Titles.eng: Dakaichi: I’m Being Harassed by the Sexiest Man of the Year
Titles.jpn: 抱かれたい男1位に脅されています。

Summaries.eng: A seasoned actor faces his biggest threat yet: the rising star who stole his title—and might just steal his heart, too.
Summaries.jpn: 抱かれたい男ランキング」1位の座を5年連続で守り続けてきた芸歴20年のベテラン俳優・西條高人は、芸歴3年の新人俳優･東谷准太にその座を奪われ、連覇の悲願を絶たれる。東谷の主演作で共演することになった高人は内心いい感情を抱いていなかったが、あれよあれよと2人で飲みに行くことになってしまう。翌日、高人は東谷宅のベッドで目を覚まし、昨晩の痴態を東谷によって動画に収められていた。揺すられるのではと考えた高人は何でも言うことを聞くと交渉を持ちかけるが、東谷は西條を抱きたいと言いだす。一度は拒絶した西條だったが、押しの強い東谷に押し切られる形で2人は肉体関係を結び、両者は親密な間柄となっていく。

Titles.eng: DAKAICHI -I'm Being Harassed By The Sexiest Man Of The Year- Movie: Spain
Titles.jpn: 劇場版 抱かれたい男1位に脅されています。～スペイン編～

Summaries.eng: Higashiya and Takato have decided to co-star in the two-person play "Blood Wedding" that incorporates flamenco. Although Takato works hard on the stage practice, he realizes the difference in talent with Higashiya while practicing flamenco. So Takato decided to fly to Spain to learn "passion". On the other hand, Higashiya isn't over a person he knew in the past.
Summaries.jpn: 東谷とタカトはフラメンコを取り入れた2人組のプレイ「ブラッドウエディング」で共演することを決定しました。 タカトはステージ練習に励んでいますが、フラメンコを練習しながら東谷との才能の違いに気づきます。 そこでタカトは「情熱」を学ぶためにスペインに飛ぶことにしました。 一方、東谷は彼が過去に知っていた人を超えていません。

Titles.eng: In the world of show business, it's eat or be eaten.
Titles.jpn: 芸能界は喰うか喰われるか。

Summaries.eng: Enter the cut-throat world of the entertainment industry, where the two most desirable men find themselves in a forbidden scandal.

Titles.eng: Is he sick of me already?
Titles.jpn: あいつ、もう俺に飽きやがったのか。

Summaries.eng: Junta keeps following around Takato, but then one day, Junta begins to avoid Takato for a strange reason.
Junta and Takato are busy filming "Mid-afternoon Star" while also publicizing the movie. Eventually, though, the shoot wraps…

Titles.eng: I can make you my woman.
Titles.jpn: 俺の女にしてあげますよ。

Summaries.eng: Junta has to go location shooting and won't be able to see Takato for four whole days. Meanwhile, Takato starts rehearsing for his upcoming play, and the lead person for this play is…

Titles.eng: Why am I at a hotel with him… Did we… There's no way... Is there!?
Titles.jpn: なんでコイツとホテルで一緒に…まさか… いやいやいやないよな？ そんな…そん…。

Summaries.eng: A wasted Takato has spent the night with Ayagi. The next morning, Takato looks at his phone and sees that Junta had been trying to contact him all night…

Titles.jpn: 好きでいてもいいですか。

Summaries.eng: The two first met on the set of "Vial of Sun," the TV drama in which Junta is making his acting debut. During the shoot, while interacting with Takato for the first time, Junta gets the distinct impression that he’s hated. And yet, at the same time, he has feelings that he’s never experienced before.

Titles.jpn: ず、ずらすな、海パンずらすな。

Summaries.eng: Takato was working on a commercial in Hawaii, but being a superstar competent actor, he finished two days early. Wanting to spend the remaining two days relaxing, he "coincidentally" runs into not only Junta, but into Chihiro and Narumiya as well.
With "The Red Leaf Ogre" opening soon, Takato finds himself busier than ever with rehearsals and TV show appearances. Amid all the hubbub, he looks back to a year ago, when he first met Azumaya.

Titles.eng: If you're that in love with me, you can have your way with me until you're done.
Titles.jpn: そんなに俺に惚れてんなら、飽きるまで抱かせてやるよ。

Summaries.eng: A scandalous picture of Takato with Junta has been published in the tabloids. With suspicions of "Forbidden Love," Takato becomes the target of society's attention in a negative way. How will Junta and Takato fair in this storm?
Takato focuses on work, but is uninterested. For the first time, he speaks about his feelings for Junta to Mr. Sasaski. Meanwhile, Junta is coming up with a plan.

Titles.jpn: ふっふっふ～ん♪ふっふっふ～ん♪ふっふっふ～ふふ～ん♪

Summaries.eng: Takato blusters about coming up with the plans for Christmas Eve, but then works non-stop with no holiday inspirations coming to him. His anxiety ratchets up when Junta doesn’t show up on Christmas Eve.
